title: Sensational news! 爆炸性新闻！
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question.What did the writer think of the story?,
听录音，然后回答问题。作者对这个故事怎么看？

text_and_translation.text: A child has been kidnapped in the city centre.
text_and_translation.translation: 一个孩子在市中心被绑架了。

text_and_translation.text: Police have been searching the area.
text_and_translation.translation: 警方一直在搜查这个地区。

text_and_translation.text: They are still looking for the child.
text_and_translation.translation: 他们仍在寻找那个孩子。

text_and_translation.text: She is being questioned by the police.
text_and_translation.translation: 她正在接受警方的审问。

text_and_translation.text: We will bring you more information as soon as it comes in.
text_and_translation.translation: 一有新消息，我们就会立即向你报道。

notes.title: Sensational news
notes.describe: 这个词组表示引起广泛关注或轰动的新闻，通常涉及意外、丑闻或重大事件。
